title: Zone-Level Access Applications
description: Access Applications define the routes that Access will block. (NOTE: it's recommended that the account route namespace is used instead: https://api.cloudflare.com/#access-applications-properties.)

links.title: List Access Applications
links.description: List Access Applications for an account

      "aud": "737646a56ab1df6ec9bddc7e5ca84eaf3b0768850f3ffb5d74f1534911fe3893",
      "type": "self_hosted",
      "name": "Admin Site",
      "domain": "test.example.com/admin",
      "logo_url": "https://www.cloudflare.com/img/logo-web-badges/cf-logo-on-white-bg.svg",
      "app_launcher_visible": true,
      "session_duration": "24h",
      "allowed_idps": [
        "699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252"
      ],
      "auto_redirect_to_identity": false,
      "enable_binding_cookie": false,
      "http_only_cookie_attribute": true,
      "same_site_cookie_attribute": "strict",

          "GET"
        ],

        ],

      },
      "skip_interstitial": true,

    }
  ]
}

links.title: Create Self Hosted Access Application
links.description: Create a new Self Hosted Access Application

domain.description: The domain and path that Access will block

logo_url.description: Defines the image URL for the logo shown in the app launcher dashboard.

app_launcher_visible.description: Defines whether or not an app is displayed in the App Launcher.

session_duration.description: Defines the amount of time that the tokens issued for this application will be valid. Must be in the format '300ms' or '2h45m'. Valid time units are 'ns', 'us' (or 'µs'), 'ms', 's', 'm', 'h'.

allowed_idps.description: The identity providers selected for application. Defaults to all IDPs if empty.

items.description: The identity providers selected for application

auto_redirect_to_identity.description: Option to skip identity provider selection if only one is configured in allowed_idps.

enable_binding_cookie.description: Option that provides increased security against compromised authorization tokens and CSRF attacks.

custom_deny_message.description: Option that returns a custom error message when a user is denied access to the application.

custom_deny_url.description: Option that redirects to a custom URL when a user is denied access to the application.

http_only_cookie_attribute.description: Defines whether or not access tokens will be set as http_only cookies. Increases security against XSS attacks.

same_site_cookie_attribute.description: Defines the same-site cookie setting for access tokens. Increases security against CSRF attacks.

allow_credentials.description: Include credentials (cookies, authorization headers, or TLS client certificates) with requests.

max_age.description: The max age that preflight requests can be cached.

skip_interstitial.description: Defines whether or not access to skip the authorization interstitial when using the cli.

service_auth_401_redirect.description: Returns a 401 status code in service authentication rules on failed requests.

parameters.example:
{
  "type": "self_hosted",
  "name": "Admin Site",
  "domain": "test.example.com/admin",
  "logo_url": "https://www.cloudflare.com/img/logo-web-badges/cf-logo-on-white-bg.svg",
  "app_launcher_visible": true,
  "session_duration": "24h",
  "allowed_idps": [
    "699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252"
  ],
  "auto_redirect_to_identity": false,
  "enable_binding_cookie": false,
  "http_only_cookie_attribute": true,
  "same_site_cookie_attribute": "strict",
  "cors_headers": {
    "allowed_methods": [
      "GET"
    ],
    "allowed_origins": [
      "https://example.com"
    ],
    "allow_all_headers": true,
    "max_age": -1
  },
  "skip_interstitial": true,
  "service_auth_401_redirect": true
}
parameters.title: Self Hosted Application

links.title: Create SaaS Access Application
links.description: Create a new SaaS Access Application
links.curl:
curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252/access/apps" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"type":"saas","name":"Admin Site","logo_url":"https://www.cloudflare.com/img/logo-web-badges/cf-logo-on-white-bg.svg","app_launcher_visible":true,"saas_app":{"consumer_service_url":"https://example.com","sp_entity_id":"example unique name","public_key":"example unique name","idp_entity_id":"https://example.cloudflareaccess.com","name_id_format":"id","sso_endpoint":"https://example.cloudflareaccess.com/cdn-cgi/access/sso/saml/b3f58a2b414e0b51d45c8c2af26fccca0e27c63763c426fa52f98dcf0b3b3bfd","custom_attributes":{"name":"family_name","name_format":"urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:attrname-format:basic","source":{"name":"last_name"}},"created_at":"2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z","updated_at":"2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z"},"allowed_idps":["699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252"],"auto_redirect_to_identity":false}'

logo_url.description: Defines the image URL for the logo shown in the app launcher dashboard.

app_launcher_visible.description: Defines whether or not an app is displayed in the App Launcher.

consumer_service_url.description: The service provider's endpoint (URL) that is responsible for receiving and parsing a SAML assertion.

sp_entity_id.description: A globally unique name for an identity or service provider.

public_key.description: The Access Public Certificate that will be used to verify your identity.

idp_entity_id.description: The unique identifier of your SaaS application. Sometimes referred to as the IDP Entity ID.

name_id_format.description: The value we provide to the SaaS application in the subject field.

sso_endpoint.description: The endpoint where your SaaS application will send login requests.

name_format.description: A globally unique name for an identity or service provider.

name.description: The name of the IdP attribute.

allowed_idps.description: The identity providers selected for application. Defaults to all IDPs if empty.

items.description: The identity providers selected for application

auto_redirect_to_identity.description: Option to skip identity provider selection if only one is configured in allowed_idps.

parameters.title: SaaS Application

links.title: Update VNC Access Application
links.description: Update a VNC Access Application

domain.description: The domain and path that Access will block

logo_url.description: Defines the image URL for the logo shown in the app launcher dashboard.

app_launcher_visible.description: Defines whether or not an app is displayed in the App Launcher.

session_duration.description: Defines the amount of time that the tokens issued for this application will be valid. Must be in the format '300ms' or '2h45m'. Valid time units are 'ns', 'us' (or 'µs'), 'ms', 's', 'm', 'h'.

allowed_idps.description: The identity providers selected for application. Defaults to all IDPs if empty.

items.description: The identity providers selected for application

auto_redirect_to_identity.description: Option to skip identity provider selection if only one is configured in allowed_idps.

enable_binding_cookie.description: Option that provides increased security against compromised authorization tokens and CSRF attacks.

custom_deny_message.description: Option that returns a custom error message when a user is denied access to the application.

custom_deny_url.description: Option that redirects to a custom URL when a user is denied access to the application.

http_only_cookie_attribute.description: Defines whether or not access tokens will be set as http_only cookies. Increases security against XSS attacks.

same_site_cookie_attribute.description: Defines the same-site cookie setting for access tokens. Increases security against CSRF attacks.

allow_credentials.description: Include credentials (cookies, authorization headers, or TLS client certificates) with requests.

max_age.description: The max age that preflight requests can be cached.

skip_interstitial.description: Defines whether or not access to skip the authorization interstitial when using the cli.

service_auth_401_redirect.description: Returns a 401 status code in service authentication rules on failed requests.

links.title: Update SaaS Access Application
links.description: Update a new SaaS Access Application
links.curl:
curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252/access/apps/699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"type":"saas","name":"Admin Site","logo_url":"https://www.cloudflare.com/img/logo-web-badges/cf-logo-on-white-bg.svg","app_launcher_visible":true,"saas_app":{"consumer_service_url":"https://example.com","sp_entity_id":"example unique name","public_key":"example unique name","idp_entity_id":"https://example.cloudflareaccess.com","name_id_format":"id","sso_endpoint":"https://example.cloudflareaccess.com/cdn-cgi/access/sso/saml/b3f58a2b414e0b51d45c8c2af26fccca0e27c63763c426fa52f98dcf0b3b3bfd","custom_attributes":{"name":"family_name","name_format":"urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:attrname-format:basic","source":{"name":"last_name"}},"created_at":"2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z","updated_at":"2014-01-01T05:20:00.12345Z"},"allowed_idps":["699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252"],"auto_redirect_to_identity":false}'

logo_url.description: Defines the image URL for the logo shown in the app launcher dashboard.

app_launcher_visible.description: Defines whether or not an app is displayed in the App Launcher.

consumer_service_url.description: The service provider's endpoint (URL) that is responsible for receiving and parsing a SAML assertion.

sp_entity_id.description: A globally unique name for an identity or service provider.

public_key.description: The Access Public Certificate that will be used to verify your identity.

idp_entity_id.description: The unique identifier of your SaaS application. Sometimes referred to as the IDP Entity ID.

name_id_format.description: The value we provide to the SaaS application in the subject field.

sso_endpoint.description: The endpoint where your SaaS application will send login requests.

name_format.description: A globally unique name for an identity or service provider.

name.description: The name of the IdP attribute.

allowed_idps.description: The identity providers selected for application. Defaults to all IDPs if empty.

items.description: The identity providers selected for application

auto_redirect_to_identity.description: Option to skip identity provider selection if only one is configured in allowed_idps.

object_definition.description: Access Applications define the routes that Access will block. (NOTE: it's recommended that the account route namespace is used instead: https://api.cloudflare.com/#access-applications-properties.)
